channel.title: Rscd account creation error
channel.description:
when i try to make an account, i fill out everything then press submit, then it says creating account..... then i get connection interrupted. the accounts i make are made, but does not work. they end up as all nulled. any clue on how to fix the connection interrupted? is it because i need to port forward?
thanks
